p: RT-PCR products were purified, labeled with the Big Dye Terminator chemistry v3.1 (Applied Biosystems), and then analysed by an automatic genetic analyser ABI PRISM 3130xl (Applied Biosystems). Sequences were assembled with the software package CLC Main Workbench v7.6.13 and aligned with Clustal X [ 16]. Moreover, alignments were manually edited when needed using BioEdit v7.2.6 [ http://www.mbio.ncsu.edu/BioEdit/bioedit.html].
